title: News24.com | US sees 345 virus deaths, 18 000 new cases in 24 hours
description: The United States has seen a record 18,000 new confirmed coronavirus cases and 345 deaths over the past 24 hours, according to a Johns Hopkins University tracker.
content:
The United States has seen a record 18 000 new confirmed coronavirus cases and 345 deaths over the past 24 hours, according to a Johns Hopkins University tracker.
There are now 97 028 declared virus cases in the country and there have been 1 475 deaths, John… [+14 chars]
